Entrada Salida

Item Item 
#include "stdio.h"

int main()
{
int n, sum = 0, c, value;

printf("Enter the number of integers you want to add\n");
scanf("%d", &n);

printf("Enter %d integers\n",n);

for (c = 1; c <= n; c++)
{
  scanf("%d", &value);
  sum = sum + value;
}

printf("Sum of entered integers = %d\n",sum);

return 0;
}

Salida

Salida Esperada

> Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. In impedit quae vero deleniti, ab quam deserunt maxime consectetur at repellendus fugit delectus quidem quibusdam, sapiente aspernatur autem earum nihil voluptate!

> Hola Mundo!
> Lista la consola, con overflow y todo :)
